name: The Undead
startIntroPart1: 'When there's no more room in Hell, the dead will walk the earth.' - George A. Romero
startIntroPart2: 'Darkness falls across the land, the midnight hour is close at hand, creatures crawl in search of blood to terrorize y'all's neighborhood' - Vincent Price
uniqueText: Cannot build Settlers. Massive disadvantages when trying to ally with City-States. +30% Strength when fighting City-State units and cities. 67% chance to earn 25 Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit from a conquered encampment (50% for naval units). Unhappiness from population largely decreased. Science, Culture, and Golden Ages decreased by 50%. 10% combat bonus from Fallout and Graveyards. Melee units heal 25 damage and gain culture when they kill a unit. Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged. All military units have a 10% penalty against other military units. Non-air units have a bonus against cities.
